SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.serverController

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.serverController.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Manages the game dynamics including the lobby, player interactions, and connections.

  • Method Details

    • checkNickname

      public int checkNickname(String nickname)
      Checks if the nickname is already present in the list of players or among the disconnected players and returns 0, -1 respectively. If the username is available it returns 1.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the username chosen by the player
      Returns:
      a number representing the availability of the username

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickname)
      Adds a player to the game. If the game is empty, the player is added to the game. If the game is not full, the player is added to the game. If the game is full, the player is added to the game and the game is started.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player

    • isFirst

      public boolean isFirst()
      Returns:
      true if the player is the first player, false otherwise

    • newGame

      public void newGame()
      Starts the game. The game is started when the number of players is equal to the number of players chosen by the first player.

    • addClientTCP

      public void addClientTCP(String nickname, HandleClientSocket client)
      Method to add a TCP client to the game controller
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      client - the client associated to the player

    • isTCP

      public boolean isTCP(String nickname)
      Method to check if a player is a TCP client
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player

    • addClientRMI

      public void addClientRMI(String nickname, ClientCommunicationInterface client)

      Parameters:

      client - the client associated to the player

    • isRMI

      public boolean isRMI(String nickname)
      Method to check if a player is an RMI client
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player

    • chooseObjectiveCard

      public void chooseObjectiveCard(Player player, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard)
      Sets the secret objective card for the selected player.
      Parameters:
      player - who chose the objective card.
      objectiveCard - chosen objective card.

    • playStarterCard

      public void playStarterCard(Player player, StarterCard starterCard)
      Places the starter card on the player's play area.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who is placing the starter card.
      starterCard - the starter card to be placed.

    • getCommonObjectiveCards

      public List<ObjectiveCard> getCommonObjectiveCards()
      Draws two secret objective cards form the objective deck to pass them to all the clients.
      Returns:
      the list of common objectives cards for the current game.

    • getSecretObjectiveCardsOptions

      public List<ObjectiveCard> getSecretObjectiveCardsOptions()
      Draws two objective cards from the objective deck. The server will pass these two cards to the client who will get to choose one of them.
      Returns:
      the two possible secret objective cards.

    • getStarterCard

      public StarterCard getStarterCard()
      Draws a starter card from the starter deck in the game.
      Returns:
      a starter card.

    • getReadyPlayersNumber

      public int getReadyPlayersNumber()

    • getStarterCardsMap

      public Map<String,StarterCard> getStarterCardsMap()

      public Map<String,Map<CornerContent,Integer>> getPlayersStock()

    • playCard

      public void playCard(String nickname, PlayableCard card, Coordinates coordinates) throws InvalidNicknameException, InvalidMoveException, InvalidGameStateException
      Allows a player to play a card, it will call the game's playCard This method will be called by the client to play a card.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player who is playing the card.
      card - the card to be played.
      coordinates - the coordinates on the board where the card will be placed.
      Throws:
      InvalidNicknameException
      InvalidMoveException
      InvalidGameStateException

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(String nickname, PlayableCard chosenCard) throws InvalidNicknameException, InvalidChoiceException, InvalidGameStateException
      Allows a player to draw a card from the available options. This method will be called by the client to draw a card.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player who is drawing the card.
      chosenCard - The card chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      InvalidNicknameException
      InvalidChoiceException
      InvalidGameStateException

    • gameIsFull

      public boolean gameIsFull()

    • gameIsEmpty

      public boolean gameIsEmpty()

    • checkNumberOfPlayer

      public boolean checkNumberOfPlayer(int numPlayer)
      It checks if the player's number chosen by the first player is correct
      Returns:
      true if the player's number chosen by the first player is correct

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      Checks if the game has started.
      Returns:
      True if the game has started, false otherwise.

    • changeTurn

      public void changeTurn()
      Changes the turn to the next player in the game. This method will be called to switch the turn to the next player.

    • getScores

      public Map<String,Integer> getScores()

    • getFinalScores

      public Map<String,Integer> getFinalScores()
      Calculate and get the final scores
      Returns:
      map with each player's score

    • checkScores

      public boolean checkScores()

    • checkEmptyDeck

      public boolean checkEmptyDeck()
      Checks if the deck is empty. This method will be called to check if the deck is empty.
      Returns:
      True if the deck is empty, false otherwise.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over. This method will be called to determine if the game has ended.
      Returns:
      True if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • findWinner

      public String findWinner()
      Retrieves the nickname of the winner.

    • isLastRound

      public boolean isLastRound()
      Checks whether it is the last turn of the game. The last turn is triggered when at least one player reaches (or exceeds) a certain score or when both decks are empty. Players finish their current rounds and each plays an additional turn, so they resolve the same number of turns by the end of the game.
      Returns:
      true if it is the last turn, false otherwise.

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame()
      Saves the current game in the json backup file

    • isGameSaved

      public boolean isGameSaved()
      Checks whether the game has been saved or not. This is done by checking if the JSON that contains the state of the game exists.
      Returns:
      true if the game has been saved, false otherwise

    • loadLastGame

      public void loadLastGame() throws IOException
      Loads the game saved in the JSON file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file does not exist

    • getDisconnectedPlayers

      public List<String> getDisconnectedPlayers()

    • getHandsMap

      public Map<String,List<PlayableCard>> getHandsMap()

    • getPlayAreasMap

      public Map<String,Card[][]> getPlayAreasMap()
      Method to get the play areas of the players
